user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in a bra, particularly as I transitioned away from traditional wired options.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable, wire-free bra to replace my traditional bras, as I have been transitioning to wire-free options due to discomfort. I chose this product because I have had positive experiences with the brand in the past, and I was excited about the features like the soft fabric and seamless design. However, the fit was not right for my body type, leading to disappointment.

I needed a supportive and comfortable wireless bra that would enhance my natural shape without flattening it. The product's description highlighted its superior support and comfort, which resonated with my needs. I was also influenced by the positive reviews from other customers who shared similar body types and preferences, which gave me confidence in my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a comfortable and flattering fit, with an emphasis on quality materials and construction. I value items that are versatile for different occasions, whether for workouts or casual wear, and appreciate features like breathability and moisture-wicking properties. I tend to favor products that provide good support, especially in clothing like bras and shoes, and I am drawn to stylish designs that enhance my overall appearance. Additionally, I have a preference for items that are true to size or have clear sizing recommendations, as I often find myself frustrated with inconsistent sizing. On the downside, I dislike products that have awkward fits, poor quality materials, or sizing issues that lead to discomfort. I am particularly sensitive to items that do not stay in place or that feel too tight or loose in certain areas.

conversation.content: I want to find a bra that offers both comfort and support, especially as I move away from traditional wired options. within my expected price range: [18.99, 21.99]
What type of closure do you prefer for your bras, such as hook-and-eye closure or pull-on style?
I prefer bras with a hook-and-eye closure for ease of putting them on and adjusting the fit.
What specific features or design elements are important to you in terms of comfort and support in a bra?

I look for bras that offer a comfortable and flattering fit, with features like soft fabric, seamless design, and superior support. I prefer bras that enhance my natural shape without flattening it. A bra with good support and comfort is crucial for me, especially as I transition away from wired options.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Women's Pure Comfort Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1274> / Item ID: B07S3LQ9NQ / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you thought it was impossible to find the support you need with the comfort you deserve, think again. JMS® presents their Pure Comfort® wireless, full-coverage bra that has everything you want in a bra. It starts with the remarkably comfortable yet effective light support, achieved with smartly engineered strategic support zones and a wider, no-roll knit underband for subtle under bust shaping. You'll love the convenience and ease of the front-close styling, with plush cushioning under the hook-and-eye panel for no-dig comfort. The seamless design gives you the sleek, smooth look you want under T-shirts and other clingy clothes. Wider straps and a built-up back help smooth away bulges even more. Plus, this wire-free tee shirt bra is made with moisture-wicking fabric that helps to keep you cool and dry all day. Made with 4-way stretch that moves effortlessly with you, there's a lot to love in this front-close wirefree bra from JMS."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Just My Size Women's Easy On Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1107> / Item ID: B08V8YTH95 / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Love the convenience of front-close bras? Here's one that combines front-hook ease with comfortable full support. All at an affordable price in sizes up to 54 DD!"] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Double Support Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree T-Shirt Bra, Comfortable Cotton Wirefree Bra, Our Best Everyday Bra> / Item ID: B000MX5ZSM / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Cotton comfort.
